about_the_game:
The story of Lee's adventures, who crashed and found himself on a desert island, continues! And now a new island awaits Lee, much bigger than the previous one. Two faithful girlfriends are beside him, and a lot of secrets lies ahead, beautiful but dangerous monster girls, new enemies, the mystery of a lost civilization, and of course the search for the kidnapped pilot girl Tonya, who is being held somewhere on the island!

For now, this is just a sequel prototype, with no story yet, and without some planned features yet to be developed!

A large island is available for you to explore it freely. No more static locations and point & click movement! Lee can run anywhere and look under every bush! You'll encounter both small animals that you can hunt on, as well as dangerous predators that can hunt you.



Your companions, Cat and Octa, have also gone to explore new territories and you'll have to find them and discuss with them what they've seen on their way. And they both won't mind taking the conversation to a different, much more intimate level. Aside from them, you'll be accompanied around the island by a sharp-tongued Fairy who has an opinion on everything and swears like a cobbler! You'll be able to see what she does to entertain herself when she's bored!

In addition to the beautiful views of the tropical island and meeting old acquaintances, a small but interesting quest awaits you. This quest will give some answers to one of the mysteries of the island and at the same time provide food for thought about the nature of the local creatures.



And of course, your journey will be accompanied by familiar and beloved music and the lively sounds of nature, so don't forget to turn on your headsets to fully immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a tropical adventure!

Key Features


  • A big completely new island;
  • Open-world and free roam;
  • Lots of points of interest to explore;
  • 3 sexy girlfriends;
  • Inventory and an updated quest system;
  • Building, crafting, hunting, gathering and cooking.

Prototype Features


  • This is the second version of the prototype, with basic gameplay;
  • Visuals have been simplified compared to the first versions of the prototype;
  • No Mac OS support;
  • No Gamepad/Steam Deck support;
  • The prototype is free to all owners of Tame It!

Features Plans


  • Continuation of the story;
  • Further development of crafting, cooking, and inventory systems;
  • A new communication system with new characters;
  • The new monster girl is almost finished!

All of this will certainly look and work differently, thanks to the new engine and the opportunities it gives. It will also allow us to rework some irritating gameplay elements.

We also plan to add a lot of new features!

  • Building and developing your own village;
  • Open world to explore and conquest;
  • Lots of NPCs;
  • Hot scenes with realtime animations;
  • Beautiful monster-girls breeding;
  • Interesting storyline with an extensive system of quests;
  • Several endings depend on your choices.

As you can see, our plans are truly ambitious! With your support, this prototype could become a full-fledged game. But for now, we're at the very beginning of this exciting journey.

content_descriptors.notes: Our game gives you a chance to hunt for some beautiful representatives of local fauna, sexually as well. We also have shrooms and berries with some natural effects that will help you in your hunt. If the girls like you, get ready for the kinks of many kinds. Otherwise, they may get violent.

detailed_description:
GAME LANGUAGE

Prototype is English only!
We plan to add localizations in full game, but now we don't have enough resources for translation.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any reasonable new Linux distro from CentOS 7.x and up
  • Processor: Intel 7th generation or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 (or AMD equivalent)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: kernel 3.x or newer
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Any reasonable new Linux distro from CentOS 7.x and up
  • Processor: Intel 10th generation or equivalent
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 3000 series (or AMD equivalent)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: kernel 3.x or newer

name: Tame It! Sequel Prototype

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel 7th generation or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 (or AMD equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel 10th generation or equivalent
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 3000 series (or AMD equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: This is the sequel prototype to the game Tame It! The adventures of Lee, who crashed and found himself on a desert island, continues! A new big island full of life and the freedom to explore it, as well as a hot meeting with tamed beauties awaits you.
